title: How can we help?
subtitle: Choose a topic to find answers
botWelcome: Hi! I'm here to help. Pick a question below or ask me anything!
botFallback: I'm not sure about that one. Try asking a different way, or contact our support team at support@example.com for personalized help!
a1: Getting started is easy! Just sign up for a free account, pick a template, and you'll be building in under 2 minutes. No credit card required.
a2: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. Try everything risk-free before committing.
q3: What's included in the Pro plan?
a3: Pro includes unlimited projects, priority support, advanced analytics, custom domains, team collaboration, and API access. Everything you need to scale.
a4: Absolutely. No contracts, no hidden fees. Cancel from your account settings with one click. We also offer a 30-day money-back guarantee.
a5: Yes! Our REST API gives you full programmatic access. Check out docs.example.com for authentication guides, endpoints, and code examples in multiple languages.
a6: We use bank-level AES-256 encryption, SOC 2 Type II certified infrastructure, and are fully GDPR compliant. Your data security is our top priority.
a7: Of course! Invite unlimited team members on Pro and Enterprise plans. Set granular permissions (Admin, Editor, Viewer) for each member.
q8: How do I reset my password?
a8: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and we'll send a secure reset link within seconds. Link expires in 1 hour for security.
a9: 50+ integrations including Slack, GitHub, Figma, Notion, Zapier, Jira, and more. New integrations added monthly.
a10: Email support@example.com, use in-app chat, or schedule a call. Average response time is under 4 hours.
a11: Comprehensive docs at docs.example.com with tutorials, guides, API references, and video walkthroughs.
a12: Yes! Export all your data anytime in JSON, CSV, or PDF format from Settings â†’ Data â†’ Export.
q_create_project: How do I create my first project?
a_create_project: Click the 'New Project' button in your dashboard, choose a template or start from scratch, and follow the guided setup wizard. You'll be up and running in under 2 minutes.
a_sys_req: We're fully web-based, so all you need is a modern browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge). No downloads or installations required.
a_billing: We bill monthly or annually based on your plan. Annual plans save you 20%. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime from your account settings.
a_refund: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all plans. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a full refundâ€”no questions asked.
a_team_discount: Yes! Teams of 5+ get 15% off, and teams of 20+ get 25% off. Contact our sales team for custom enterprise pricing.
q_delete_account: How do I delete my account?
a_delete_account: Go to Settings â†’ Account â†’ Delete Account. You'll have 30 days to change your mind before data is permanently removed.
a_features: Core features include project management, real-time collaboration, version control integration, deployment automation, and analytics.
a_customize: Absolutely! Customize themes, layouts, keyboard shortcuts, and create custom workflows to match your team's needs.
a_offline: Yes, our desktop app supports offline mode. Changes sync automatically when you're back online.
a_training: Yes! Free onboarding sessions for teams, plus premium training packages for enterprise customers.

general.title: General
general.a1: We're an all-in-one platform that helps teams build, deploy, and scale modern web applications. Think of us as your development superpower.
general.a2: Developers, designers, and teams of all sizesâ€”from solo founders to enterprise organizations. Anyone who wants to ship faster.
general.a3: Yes! Our free tier includes core features with generous limits. Perfect for personal projects and getting started.
general.a4: Yes! We love hearing from our community. Visit our public roadmap to vote on features or suggest new ones.

pricing.title: Pricing & Billing
pricing.a1: Plans start at $29/month for individuals. Team plans start at $99/month. Enterprise pricing is customâ€”contact sales for details.
pricing.a2: Yes! Annual billing saves you 20%. That's 2 months free compared to monthly billing.
pricing.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.a3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and wire transfers for enterprise accounts.
pricing.a4: 30-day money-back guarantee on all plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund youâ€”no questions asked.

features.title: Features & Capabilities
features.a1: Core features include project management, real-time collaboration, version control integration, deployment automation, and analytics.
features.a2: Yes! Our REST API gives you full programmatic access. GraphQL API is coming soon.
features.a3: 50+ integrations including GitHub, GitLab, Slack, Figma, Notion, Jira, Linear, and Zapier for custom workflows.
features.a4: Yes, every component is fully responsive and tested on all major devices and screen sizes.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.a1: Absolutely. We use AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit, with SOC 2 Type II certification and regular security audits.
security.a2: Yes, we're fully GDPR compliant. You can export or delete your data at any time from your account settings.
security.a3: Never. Your data is yours. We don't sell, share, or monetize your data in any way.
security.a4: Our data is hosted in secure, redundant data centers located in the US and EU. You can choose your data residency.
